channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 Networks, Inc. -- BIG-IP (LTM, AAM, AFM, APM, ASM, Edge Gateway, Link Controller, PEM, PSM, WebAccelerator, WebSafe)

item.title: CVE-2017-6155|2024-09-17T03:33:51.738Z -- f5%20networks%2C%20inc. -- big-ip%20%28ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20psm%2C%20webaccelerator%2C%20websafe%29
item.description: On F5 BIG-IP 13.0.0, 12.0.0-12.1.3.1, 11.6.0-11.6.2, 11.4.1-11.5.5, or 11.2.1, malformed SPDY or HTTP/2 requests may result in a disruption of service to TMM. Data plane is only exposed when a SPDY or HTTP/2 profile is attached to a virtual server. There is no control plane exposure.
